system.effect: Prerequisites: Spirit Mending Messiah: One Time Use/10 - Extended Action Signer: Interrupt Messiah Trigger: A Trainer or Pokémon dies. Signer Trigger: A Trainer or Pokémon is reduced below 0 HP. Messiah Effect: Your divine powers allow you to intervene, saving the Target’s life. They are set to 5 Injuries that will heal at half the normal rate, and 1 HP. Signer Effect: The Target receives no further injuries after being reduced below 0 HP. If being Knocked Out alone would set them to 10 injuries, they instead are set to 9 Injuries.
